text: Læa phraxngkh khux phu thi thrng srang brrda chan fa læa phændin dwy khwam cring læa wan thi phraxngkh tras wa cea cng pen khun læw man k ca pen khun phra daras khxng phraxngkh khux khwam cring læa xanac thanghlay nan pen khxng phraxngkh nı wan thi ca thuk pea kheapi nı tær phra phuthrng rxbru nı sing renlab læa nı sing peidphey læa phraxngkh khux phuthrng pricha yan phuthrng rxbru xyang laxeiyd thithwn
